translations.english: If you do this, then imperial authority will not be carried out."

translations.chinese: 後上朝，太公擁彗，迎門卻行。
translations.english: Later when the emperor came to court, the Duke of Tai held a broom and went backwards to meet him at the gate.
The emperor was greatly shocked and got down to support the Duke of Tai.

translations.chinese: 太公曰：「帝，人主，奈何以我亂天下法！」
translations.english: The Duke of Tai said: "The emperor is the ruler of men. How can you disorder the world's laws for my sake!"

translations.chinese: 於是上心善家 令言，賜黃金五百斤。
translations.english: So the emperor in his heart approved of the household steward's words and granted five hundred jin of gold.
